it.polito.dp2.FDS

Interface FlightReader


  • public interface FlightReader
    Gives read-only access to some information about a flight

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDepartureAirport()
      Returns the departure airport code (3 characters)
      Time getDepartureTime()
      Returns the departure time of the flight (in the time zone of the departure airport)
      String getDestinationAirport()
      Returns the destination airport code (3 characters)
      String getNumber()
      Returns the number of the flight (2 alphabetic characters followed by up to 4 digits)

    • Method Detail
